channel.title: Id_rsa on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Id_rsa on TLDRBins

item.title: SSH
item.description: Check SSH version openssh-server (ubuntu) openssh-server (debian) Config Location /etc/ssh/sshd_config # Grep contents grep -Ev "^#" /etc/ssh/sshd_config | grep . Generate SSH Key ssh-keygen #Set filename, leave passphase blank ./id_rsa #After Creation chmod 600 id_rsa Check Public Key ssh-keygen -l -f id_rsa Generate no passphrase SSH key from encrypted key openssl rsa -in id_rsa_encrypted -out ./id_rsa Add SSH Access to Target cat id_rsa.pub #Copy and Paste to Target echo <id_rsa.
